channel.title: RSPS please help!?!?!?
channel.description:
hey there, i have project insanity v0.01 and i'm trying to add yell but it doesn't wanna work every code i try it's either the owner can onlt yell and mod admin and normal players can't or now can yell if anyone can help me i would be soo happy been trying to fix it on my own since yesterday if anyone would like the command.java code i'll copy and paste it if someone demands it
Thanks in advance

item.title: RSPS please help!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @stephen91 stephen91
item.description:
@stephen91 wrote:

here it is baring in mind i’m using the project insanity client and source
i don’t know if it’s summit to do with this command has donator in it and my server i havn’t coded it yet thanks

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

if (c.isDonator == 1 && (c.playerRights < 1 || c.playerRights > 3)){
c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Member]<img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "

  • Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
    }else if (c.playerRights == 1){
    c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Mod]<img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
  • Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
    }else if (c.playerRights == 2){
    c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Admin]<img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
  • Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
    }else if (c.playerRights == 3){
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner]<img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
  • Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
    }else if (c.playerRights == 0 && c.isDonator == 0){
    c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Player]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
  • Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
    }else if (c.playerRights == 10){
    c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Player]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
  • Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
    }
    }
    }
    }

}
